required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Linagliptin on Active GLP-1 Concentrations in Subjects With Renal Impairment
clinical_study.official_title: EFFECTS OF LINAGLIPTIN ON ACTIVE GLP-1 CONCENTRATIONS IN SUBJECTS WITH RENAL IMPAIRMENT

oversight_info.authority: Germany: Federal Institute for Drugs and Medical Devices

brief_summary.textblock: This is a bi-centric, prospective, open study comparing the effects of linagliptin on active GLP-1 concentrations in subjects with renal impairment compared to subjects with normal renal function.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Pharmacodynamics Study, Intervention Model: Parallel Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment

primary_outcome.time_frame: Glucose tolerance test following 7 days of therapy
primary_outcome.description: ΔAUCGLP-1-OGTT(0-240) Change in active GLP-1 concentrations after oral glucose ingestion after linagliptin Treatment compared between Groups.

arm_group.description: Linagliptin in TD2 subjects with normal renal function

arm_group.arm_group_label: Linagliptin in TD2 subjects with impaired renal function
arm_group.description: Linagliptin in TD2 subjects with impaired renal function

intervention.arm_group_label: Linagliptin in TD2 subjects with impaired renal function

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Have Type 2 diabetes mellitus based on the disease diagnostic criteria (WHO) classification
Exclusion Criteria:
- Subjects with type 1 diabetes, maturity onset diabetes of the young (MODY) or secondary forms of diabetes such as due to pancreatitis.
